resources.string: how are you | what's up | how's the day? | how is the day
do you want to build a snowman | do you wanna build a snowman
do you ever stop | do you ever get tired | do you even sleep | do you sleep
rip | rest in peace | rest in pepperoni
do you have a master | who is your master?
who made you | who is your owner | who is your maker
I'm awesome! | Doing great. | Doing awesome. Pumpin' dem messages out like it's christmas babyyy! | It's been a beautiful day so far.
C'mon lets go out and play!
I started as a private bot in late october 2015, but was soon put on GitHub and made public for everyone to use (end of december 2015).
:warning: You are not allowed to mess with this role (you are lower in the \"hierarchy\"). ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

The prefix for this server is **{}**

**Hey! My name is Nano!**
I have a GitHub repo, if you want to look at my code: `{p}github`
:inbox_tray: The current version is **{ver}**.
:spy: I have been coded by **DefaltSimon**.
Also: `{p}gif` command powered by **Giphy**
Nano's code is available on **GitHub**: https://github.com/DefaltSimon/Nano
You wanna invite Nano to your server? Great! **Just follow the link:** <link>

:warning: Are you sure you want to reset all Nano-related sever settings to default? (this doesn't include mutes, selfroles and commands) Confirm by replying with '{}'.
This command needs an argument: the prefix you want to set.
You ran out of time :upside_down: (timeout is {} seconds)
**SERVER SETUP** You have started the server setup. Because you started the setup, only your answers will be taken into account. **Let's get started!**

Do you want to reset all bot-related settings for this server? (this includes all standard settings along with blacklisted channels, your log channel and prefix and welcome, ban and kick messages).
```md [{yes}](Resets all settings) [{no}](Keeps all settings)```

What prefix would you like to use for all commands? Example: having *!* as your prefix translates to `!help`, `!ping`, etc.
```md [{prefix}](The prefix you want)```

What would you like me to say when a person joins your server?
The following formatting applies: *:user* -> user mention *:username* -> user name *:server* -> server name
```md [{text}](Text you want to see) [{none}](Disables join messagse)```
Would you like me to filter spam? ```md [{yes}](Enables the spam filter) [{no}](Disables the spam filter)```
Would you like me to filter swearing? ```md [{yes}](Enables the swearing filter) [{no}](Disables the swearing filter)```
What channel would you like to use for logging? ```md [{mention}](Uses the mentioned channel) [{none}](Disables logging)```

**This concludes the basic server setup.** There are more settings if you need them:
➤ channel blacklisting - `nano.blacklist add/remove #channel` ➤ leave message - `>leavemsg message` ➤ ban message - `>banmsg message` This are not all settings. For an extensive list, see below.
The prefix can simply be changed again with `nano.changeprefix prefix`. Admin and mod commands can only be used by people with a role named "Nano Admin"/"Nano Mod".
You and all admins can also add/remove/list custom commands with `>cmd add/remove/list command|response`. For a list of admin commands and their explanations, please refer to <http://nanobot.pw/commands.html#admin>
I have been tirelessly answering people for **{} days, {} hours, {} minutes and {} seconds!** :open_mouth:

It is certain | It is surely so | Without a doubt | You may rely on it | Most likely | Yes | Ask again later | Cannot predict now | Concentrate and ask again | I would say yes | JUST DO IT | My reply is no | My sources say no | Signs point to yes

`{}` *prayers said so far*...
Please specify text to put in the image.

**Hey, I'm Nano!**
To get familiar with simple commands, type `_help simple`. If you want specific info about a command, do `_help [command here]`.
Or you could just simply take a look at the wiki page: http://nanobot.pw/commands.html If you are an admin/server owner and want to set up your server for Nano, type `_setup`. It is highly recommended that you join the "official" Nano server for announcements and help : https://discord.gg/FZJB6UJ
By using Nano you agree that we may store some user data such as names of users, servers and channels to aid functionality. For more info, see `_tos`.

:shield: **Terms of Service**
On August 20th, 2017 Discord updated their Terms of Service. Bot owners must now notify their users what kind of user data they store.
By using Nano you agree that we may store some user data, such as **names of users, servers and channels**.
For more information, read <http://nanobot.pw/tos.html>

`_hello` - Welcomes you or the mentioned person. `_randomgif` - Posts a random gif from Giphy `_roll number` - rolls a random number `_wiki term` - gives you a description of a term from Wikipedia `_urban term` - gives you a description of a term from Urban Dictionary `_decide option|option...` - decides between your options so you don't have to `_tf item-name` - item prices from backpack.tf `_steam user-id` - search users on Steam
These are just a few of some of the simpler commands. For more info about each command, use `_help command` or type `_cmds` to look at the wiki page with all the commands.
Commands and their explanations can be found here: http://nanobot.pw/commands.html
Read more about these commands here: {}
Found a bug? Please report it to me, (**DefaltSimon**) on Discord. You can find me here: https://discord.gg/FZJB6UJ
You cannot submit an empty report.
You are being rate limited. Try again in 5 minutes.

Something went wrong, please report it to the dev, preferably with a screenshot. Thanks!

**TMDb/IMDb help**
`_imdb search [name or title]`, `_imdb plot [title]`, `_imdb trailer [title]`, `_imdb rating [title]`

`_remind me in [sometime]: [message]` - reminds you in your DM `_remind here in [sometime]: [message]` - reminds everyone in current channel

**Hi!** I'm Nano! Now that you have invited me to your server, you might want to set up some things. Right now only the server owner can use my restricted commands. But no worries, you can add admin permissions to others by assigning them a role named **Nano Admin**!
To begin a basic setup, type `!setup` as the server owner. It will help you set up some simple things. After that, you might want to see `!commands` to get familiar with my commands.
Also, I recommend that you join the "official" Nano server for announcements and help : https://discord.gg/FZJB6UJ
By using Nano you agree that we may store some user data such as names of users, servers and channels to aid functionality. For more info, see `!tos`.
